basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Talented Web Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, proficient in front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, and Vue.js, and back-end technologies such as Node.js, Python, and MongoDB. Experienced in developing, maintaining, and enhancing responsive websites and web applications, optimizing performance for speed and scalability, integrating APIs, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility. Passionate about delivering secure, user-friendly web experiences with a focus on AI-driven solutions.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Developed and maintained responsive websites and web applications as a core team member using modern web technologies including Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript.
highlights: Developed interactive, dynamic, and user-friendly features for the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform, including key dashboard and form components for campaign management
Translated design mockups into fully functional websites, implementing responsive design principles and ensuring cross-browser compatibility for seamless user experiences on various devices
Collaborated with back-end developers on server-side components, API integration, and third-party services to optimize application performance for speed and scalability

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led front-end and back-end development of web applications, incorporating AI solutions and ensuring seamless integration and functionality.
highlights: Led front-end development and refactoring of an exam management web application using Vue.js and Vuetify, optimizing website performance and improving page load times by 25% while ensuring responsiveness on various devices
Developed and deployed AI-powered browser extensions using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js, integrating APIs for real-time functionality and user-friendly features
Engineered web extensions like RoboGPT using Python, Node.js, and OpenAI APIs, building interactive features for natural language processing and maintaining cross-browser compatibility

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support and developed JavaScript-based tools to automate web processes and enhance efficiency.
highlights: Developed Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, troubleshooting and debugging to ensure reliability
Collaborated with team members to implement user-friendly web automation features, honing problem-solving and communication skills in a fast-paced environment

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based web templating software that automated processes and improved efficiency

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack web application demonstrating end-to-end development of responsive websites using modern web technologies.
highlights: Developed responsive websites and web applications with dynamic front-end features using React.js and component-based architecture
Integrated back-end components with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for seamless functionality and API integration
Optimized performance for speed and scalability while ensuring cross-browser compatibility

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking, showcasing front-end development with AI integration.
highlights: Built interactive web extensions using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js, ensuring responsiveness and user-friendly features
Integrated third-party AI services and optimized for performance across browsers
Conducted testing for cross-browser compatibility and security protocols

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Web extension for Nvidia Isaac Sim using LLMs and APIs to control applications via natural language, highlighting AI-driven web features.
highlights: Developed interactive features with Python and OpenAI APIs for dynamic web applications
Ensured integration and optimization for scalability and user-friendly experiences
